This is the summary of the ExampleFooLibrary

It contains
  • A short abstract that describes the purpose of the library.
  • The library has been successfully tested on which platforms? (OS X, Windows XP and Vista, Linux)
  • The latest Processing version the library has been tested with?
  • Dependencies. Does the library depend on any other library?
  • A list of examples that demonstrate the use and potential of the library.
  • Source code (if open source). We recommend using Google Code to host the source code of a library in a SVN repository, then it is very easy to browse the code online.
  • Keywords that describe the aim and function of the library.
  • Last update. When was the last update of the library?
  • A link to a zip file that includes the library, documentation and examples.
